article_text:
01:19

'Narrow window of opportunity' to keep Zika from spreading, says CDC

article_metadata.news-keywords: Medicare, hospitals, penalties, fines, readmission, Affordable Care Act, Obamacare, patient safety
article_metadata.description: Hospitals are paying greater attention to what happens to their patients after they are discharged; they risk financial penalties from Medicare if those patients are readmitted within a month.
article_metadata.title: Half of South Florida hospitals pay Medicare’s readmission penalties — again | Miami Herald
